products.title: Emperor, Gold - Roman Blind
products.description: Transform an unadorned part of the home with the alluring and glowing emperor in gold, made from a silky thread and chiffon-style cloth, which forms into a luxury blind with ribbed texture to create elegant style with little effort. Mingle the gold with oatmeal, ivory, and golden hues to craft a sophisticated scheme with depth and elegance, adding sumptuous linen and sheer fabrics to complement the metallic sheen of the blind.

products.title: Splash Solar Yellow Panel Blind
products.description: Their splash solar yellowpanel blinds is a quick and stylish way to fill a space. This yellow dimout fabric is a contemporary and stylish colour choice for any living space. Panel blinds are perfect for patio doors & are available with various control & stacking options, including a wand control making them inherently child safe. As they are a made to measure product, they are covered with their 5 year guarantee giving you that extra peace of mind when purchasing.

products.description: Featuring a gorgeous, chenille-textured fabric in mustard gold, and a country-woven thread in homely cream, the selva gold is classic and conventional. Provide your dining room with a subtle touch of grandeur by surrounding the gold with a plush, textured wallpaper in matching cream and camel.
